versionNotes: Sprint 1 demo — AI-facilitated peer discussion with author name roster
title: Sprint 1 Demo: AI-Facilitated Peer Discussion
description: Your partner has written their Sprint 1 reflection on paper. Enter their responses below, then use AI-generated questions to have a deeper conversation together.

questions.prompt: Walk through your 5 Whys chain. At which 'why' did you identify something you can actually change — a root cause where you have agency to make progress?
questions.partnerInstructions: Read your partner's written response to the required question carefully, then type it below as accurately as you can. Don't paraphrase — capture their actual words.
questions.placeholder: Type your partner's written response here exactly as they wrote it...
questions.aiContext: This is a Sprint 1 reflection in CST349 (Professional Seminar). The student completed a 5 Whys exercise to dig into a root cause of a challenge they faced. They should have identified a specific 'why' in the chain where they have personal agency to make change. Look for depth of self-reflection, specificity of the root cause, and whether the student truly identified something within their control.
questions.discussionPrompt: Use these questions to have a 3-5 minute face-to-face conversation with the author. Take turns — the partner asks, the author responds. Then summarize the key insights below.

questions.prompt: Choose 1 of 2 questions below, then enter your partner's response:
questions.selectorLabel: Which question did your partner respond to?
questionOptions: On a scale of 1-10, how much progress did you actually make? Defend your rating with specific evidence. What would move you one point higher?
Describe something you tried that didn't work. Why didn't it work? What did that failure teach you about yourself or your approach?
questions.partnerInstructions: First select which question the author chose, then type their written response below.
questions.placeholder: Type your partner's response to their chosen question here...
questions.aiContext: This is a Sprint 1 reflection in CST349 (Professional Seminar). The student chose one of two questions: either rating their progress on a 1-10 scale with evidence, or describing a failed attempt and what it taught them. Look for honest self-assessment, specific evidence, and actionable insights.
questions.discussionPrompt: Discuss these questions together. Pay attention to specificity and honesty. Summarize your conversation below.

questions.prompt: After discussing both responses with your partner, what is the single most important thing you learned about their growth journey — or about your own — from this conversation?
questions.placeholder: Reflect on the full conversation you just had...
